title: Radford Byerly, Jr. Award in Science and Technology Policy
description: To provide support for any degree-seeking, full-time graduate student at CU Boulder with a commitment to making a significant contribution to science and technology policy through a career. Student must be in good academic standing.
marketingContent: To provide support for any degree-seeking, full-time graduate student at the UC Boulder with a commitment to making a significant contribution to science and technology policy through a career. Student must be in good academic standing.
